differences.1: WE; are a specialized; event; with a mission; for secure; and accessible; digital; payments;
differences.2: DIGIPAY; is the platform; for transforming; the world; of digital payments;
differences.3: DIGIPAY; unites; businesses;, regulators;, and users;, putting users; at the center;
differences.4: DIGIPAY; seeks strong; partnerships; to promote secure; digital payments; in Bulgaria; and Central and Eastern Europe;
differences.5: Our goal; is to transform; your mission; into a competitive advantage; through customer; education;

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: Become an investor, exhibitor, or simply write to us!

boris.name: Boris Goncharov
boris.quote: It was interesting from this perspective, people shared practical experience, specific cases of financial fraud, which I believe were extremely interesting to me and the audience

goran.name: Goran Angelov
goran.quote: It won't be easy, dealing with financial fraud requires a systematic approach, which is why it's important to talk about it now

ivana.name: Ivana Rosencic
ivana.quote: The most important lessons from joining the eurozone are to work together, collaborate with the central bank, and learn from each other. At DIGI PAY, we can share this knowledge

deyan.name: Deyan Radev
deyan.quote: At DIGI PAY, we managed to discuss that inflation won't be a major problem and will have a short-term effect when joining the eurozone. These conversations in society are rare

chrystalla.name: Chrystalla Kazara
chrystalla.role: Internal Auditor, HRDA, Vice President ACFE
chrystalla.quote: The main message is about the importance of fraud prevention. As we discussed during the conference, prevention will cost companies less than dealing with the consequences later

tsvetomir.name: Tsvetomir Doskov
tsvetomir.role: SVP, Head of Financial Vertical, Sirma
tsvetomir.quote: It's important to focus simultaneously on secure and accessible digital payments, which is the theme of the conference

AdvisoryBoard.title: Advisory Board
AdvisoryBoard.AlbenaRole: Director of 'Financial Fraud Prevention Services', BORICA AD
AdvisoryBoard.AlbenaBio: With over 10 years of experience in risk management and fraud detection in fintech, iGaming, and payments. Implemented optimizations with KPI, KYC, and CRM, achieving 96% success rate and 80% reduction in losses. She holds a Master's degree in EU law from Sofia University 'St. Kliment Ohridski' and has participated in the strategy and innovation program at Harvard Business School Online.
AdvisoryBoard.AlbenaWhyJoin: I'm joining the DIGIPAY 2025 Advisory Board to share my experience in risk management, fraud prevention, and anti-money laundering strategies. I believe my knowledge in risk, AML, and innovative payment solutions will contribute to building a common understanding of current fraud trends and prevention techniques.
AdvisoryBoard.GoranBio: Goran Angelov has over 25 years of experience in information and communication technologies, as well as in the implementation of a number of successfully implemented IT projects for business and the public sector. He is founder and manager of IBS Bulgaria, one of the leading companies in the country with a focus on the Financial Industry, Analytics Solutions and System Integration, Artificial Intelligence, Fintech and Regtech Solutions, the fight against Fraud and Financial crime.
AdvisoryBoard.GoranWhyJoin: I am joining the Advisory Board because I believe my experience in digital technologies and financial services can contribute meaningfully to the development of the industry. Bulgaria has significant potential in digital payments, but realizing it requires a strategic approach that balances innovation with regulatory certainty.
AdvisoryBoard.DafinkaRole: Data and AI Business Partner, IBM
AdvisoryBoard.DafinkaBio: Dafinka Lazarova is an experienced leader in data and artificial intelligence, digital transformation, and financial technologies. As a Data and AI Business Partner at IBM, she helps businesses use AI and data for innovation and growth. With experience at IBM and Experian, Dafinka has deep knowledge in risk management, compliance, and regulatory technologies. She has successfully led corporate sales and strategic partnerships, helping financial institutions improve their digital capabilities.
AdvisoryBoard.DafinkaWhyJoin: Thrilled to join the Advisory Board of DIGIPAY 2025! I'm passionate about how AI and data-driven technologies are shaping the future of digital payments and financial services. This role is a great opportunity to contribute with my experience and share industry insights to help drive innovation in this space.
AdvisoryBoard.HristianRole: Senior Manager, Digital Banking, UniCredit Bulbank
AdvisoryBoard.HristianBio: Hristian Prashkov has been a Senior Manager, Digital Banking, UniCredit Bulbank since 2021. He is highly motivated, responsible and goal-oriented in achieving goals and successes, and his work with the field of digital payments is his passion. He graduated from Sofia University St. Kliment Ohridski, Master in Finance and Investments with a profile in Fintech and E-banking. He has extensive experience in payment systems, digital banking, and financial technology implementation.
AdvisoryBoard.HristianWhyJoin: My decision to accept the invitation to join the Advisory Board of DIGI PAY 2025 is driven by my passion and interest in innovations in financial sector and all sort of payment solutions. In my role as an advisor, I will contribute with my experience in payments from both prospective: business and regulatory one.
AdvisoryBoard.SvetlinRole: Head of Department 'Digital Analysis and Cyber Intelligence', GDCOC
AdvisoryBoard.SvetlinBio: Svetlin Lazarov is a Head of 'Digital Analysis and Cyber Intelligence' in the Cybercrime Department at the General Directorate for Combating Organized Crime, Ministry of Interior Affairs of Bulgaria. He is been involved in computer systems for more than 20 years and specializes in cybercrime investigations for more than 10 years. He was a representative of the Ministry of Interior in the working group for the creation of the Cyber Security Act.
AdvisoryBoard.SvetlinWhyJoin: As a cybersecurity expert with extensive experience in digital analysis and cyber intelligence, I am committed to contributing to the development of secure digital payment solutions and sharing insights on emerging cyber threats in the financial sector.
AdvisoryBoard.FilipBio: Filip Mutafis is Co-founder, majority shareholder, member of the Board of Directors and CEO of Paysera Bulgaria and Romania. Co-founder and member of the Board of the Bulgarian Fintech Association and Board member of the Bulgarian-Romanian Chamber of Commerce. For the past nine years, Paysera Bulgaria has been revolutionizing the payments landscape, offering cutting-edge digital payment solutions to both individuals and businesses.
AdvisoryBoard.FilipWhyJoin: I am joining the Advisory Board to contribute to the development of innovative payment solutions and share my experience in building successful fintech companies in the region.
AdvisoryBoard.PavelBio: Pavel Kaminsky - PCI QSA, 3DS, QPA, SSF, CISSP, CISA, CEH, is the guy FinTech founders call when they need to implement secure payment environments and cost-efficient PCI DSS. He is a mentor at the VISA Innovation Program, Level39, Startupbootcamp and others, an Advisory Board Member, Innovation Hub Judge, & MPE Awards Judge at MPE Berlin.
AdvisoryBoard.PavelWhyJoin: As a longstanding member of the DIGI PAY Advisory Board, I am honored to contribute to the continuous growth and impact of the conference, which expands in scale and value each year. DIGI PAY not only unites Bulgaria's fintech ecosystem—fostering valuable connections and partnerships—but also serves as a key platform for discussions on innovation, regulations, and payment security.
